arts.ttl: Harry Kane shrugs off shove of Serhou Guirassy in the box: “It’s a contact sport.”
arts.sum: Harry Kane and Joshua Kimmich have waved off talk of a potential foul on Kane's opening goal in Saturday evening's Bundesliga win over Borussia Dortmund.

arts.ttl: Niko Kovac complains that Harry Kane is unfairly awarded too many Bundesliga fouls
arts.sum: Borussia Dortmund head coach Niko Kovac had his complaints about the refereeing in Saturday evening's Bundesliga loss to Bayern Munich. In addition to admonishing match official Bastian Dankert's "petty" foul whistling, Kovac claimed that Harry Kane is allowed to draw too many fouls.

arts.ttl: Niko Kovac defends Jobe Bellingham after key scene in loss to Bayern Munich
arts.sum: Borussia Dortmund trainer Niko Kovac has defended Jobe Bellingham after a failed clearance from the young Englishman enabled Bayern to score the game-winning goal in Saturday night's Bundesliga Top-Spiel.

arts.ttl: Harry Kane scores 400th club goal as Bayern Munich beat Borussia Dortmund
arts.sum: Michael Olise’s goal ultimately secured victory in Der Klassiker.

arts.ttl: 3 things we learnt from Bayern Munich’s Klassiker victory against Borussia Dortmund
arts.sum: Bayern Munich moved seven points clear of Borussia Dortmund after their 2-1 win in the 138th edition of Der Klassiker. Harry Kane opened the scoring before Michael Olise extended their…

arts.ttl: Harry Kane's Der Klassiker masterclass helps Bayern Munich see off Borussia Dortmund
arts.sum: Harry Kane scored the opening goal and was involved in Michael Olise doubling his team's lead as Bayern Munich opened a five-point lead at the top of the Bundesliga and inflicted a first defeat of the season on rivals Borussia Dortmund. Bayern weathered the storm and doubled their advantage in the 79th minute through Olise, who reacted quickest to bundle the ball home after Kane's exquisite pass had released Díaz down the left wing.

arts.ttl: DER KLASSIKER PLAYER RATINGS | Bayern Munich 2-1 Borussia Dortmund – Goals from Harry Kane and Michael Olise help secure the win
arts.sum: In the first big matchup of the season, Bayern Munich hosted Borussia Dortmund after the Bundesliga’s return following the international break. It was expected that Bayern would dominate Dortmund in…

arts.ttl: Borussia Dortmund player ratings vs Bayern Munich
arts.sum: Full Borussia Dortmund player ratings from Saturday's Bundesliga clash against Bayern Munich.

arts.ttl: Kane notches 400th club goal as Bayern beat Dortmund to maintain perfect start
arts.sum: Harry Kane's 400th goal in club football helped Bayern Munich maintain their perfect start to the Bundesliga campaign with a 2-1 victory over Borussia Dortmund in Der Klassiker.

arts.ttl: Bayern vs Borussia Dortmund LIVE Score Updates (0-0) | 10/18/2025
arts.sum: Get real-time updates on Bayern vs Borussia Dortmund live coverage, minute by minute of the match, score, stream information and latest updates of the 2025-26 Bundesliga Matchday 7 with VAVEL. Game will start at 12:30 PM ET on October 18th, 2025.
